channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiEDR
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiEDR

item.title: CVE-2023-44248|2024-08-02T19:59:51.928Z -- fortinet -- fortiedr
item.description: An improper access control vulnerability [CWE-284] inÂ FortiEDRCollectorWindows version 5.2.0.4549 and below, 5.0.3.1007 and below, 4.0 all may allow a local attacker to prevent the collector service to start in the next system reboot by tampering with some registry keys of the service.

item.title: CVE-2023-33303|2024-08-02T15:39:36.268Z -- fortinet -- fortiedr
item.description: A insufficient session expiration in Fortinet FortiEDR version 5.0.0 through 5.0.1 allows attacker to execute unauthorized code or commands via api request
